channel.title: Gaming on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gaming on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: My Gaming Community
item.description: With what I do with Gamers Against Bigotry, and with being a long time video game lover, I tend to use the phrase “the gaming community” a lot. Generally more than once a day. It’s a term we all toss around, and we generally use it to mean “everyone who plays video games.
